item.title: Every Church Needs A Security Plan Fortified By The Second Amendment
item.description: Until Jesus comes back, churches should anticipate the persistence of crime, tragedy, and death and arm themselves accordingly.

item.title: Ted Cruz Should Move On From Sunday School Geopolitics
item.description: If you're going to let your vague memory of a Sunday school slogan guide your foreign policy aims, make sure what you learned was correct.

item.title: With Abortion And Euthanasia Votes, The U.K. Rejects The Basis Of Every Human Freedom
item.description: Once a nation ceases to respect the source of human dignity, it doesn't take long to stop respecting the rights that dignity demands.

item.title: To Love Math, Kids Should Start Older And Encounter Its Beauty
item.description: Math is something to enjoy. It is not a tool that will make you rich or a box to check for college admissions.

item.title: Budget Office Estimates Biden Border Bedlam Cost States Billions
item.description: The Biden-era chaos posed ramifications far beyond our southern border, and Washington must take every effort to ensure that it never recurs.
